tr_quotes.quote: Hayaller sihirle ya da büyü yoluyla değil; emek, kararlılık ve sıkı çalışmayla gerçekleşir
tr_quotes.author: Colin Powell

tr_quotes.quote: Çevrenizdeki çoğu insan gibi olmak zorunda değilsiniz çünkü çoğu insan asla gerçekten zengin olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Manoj Arora

tr_quotes.quote: Çok fazla insan kazandıkları parayı, sevmedikleri insanları etkilemek istemedikleri şeyleri satın almak için harcıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Will Rogers

tr_quotes.quote: Bilge bir insanın kafasında para olmalı ama kalbinde değil.
tr_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

tr_quotes.quote: Para henüz bir insanı asla mutlu etmedi, olmayacak. Bir erkek ne kadar çok sahipse, o kadar çok ister.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: Gelirimiz ayakkabılarımız gibidir; çok küçükse, bizi kıstırır ve kıstırırlar; ama çok büyüklerse tökezlememize ve takılmamıza neden olurlar.
tr_quotes.author: John Locke

tr_quotes.quote: Borsa, her şeyin fiyatını bilen ama hiçbir şeyin değerini bilmeyen bireylerle doludur.
tr_quotes.author: Phillip Fisher

tr_quotes.quote: Kendine yatırım yap. Kariyeriniz, servetinizin motorudur.
tr_quotes.author: Paul Clitheroe

tr_quotes.quote: Bilgiye yapılan yatırım en yüksek faizi verir.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: Kâr düşüşü olmadan emeğin değerinde artış olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: David Ricardo

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyaya olan net değeriniz genellikle kötü alışkanlıklarınız iyi alışkanlıklarınızdan çıkarıldıktan sonra geriye kalanlara göre belirlenir.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçekten yapmak istediğimiz şey, gerçekten yapmamız gereken şeydir. Yapmamız gereken şeyi yaptığımızda, para bize gelir, kapılar bizim için açılır, faydalı hissederiz ve yaptığımız iş bize oyun gibi gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Julia Cameron

tr_quotes.quote: Paraya ve paranın satın alabileceği şeylere sahip olmak iyidir, ancak arada bir kontrol etmek ve paranın satın alamayacağı şeyleri kaybetmediğinizden emin olmak da iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: George Horace Lorimer

tr_quotes.quote: Paranızın kontrolünü ele geçirmelisiniz, yoksa paranın eksikliği sizi sonsuza kadar kontrol eder.
tr_quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

tr_quotes.quote: Boş cepler asla kimseyi geride tutmaz. Bunu sadece boş kafalar ve boş kalpler yapabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

tr_quotes.quote: Zenginlik, büyük mülklere sahip olmaktan değil, çok az ihtiyaca sahip olmaktan ibarettir.
tr_quotes.author: Epiktetos

tr_quotes.quote: Maaşınız düşükken bir şeyler biriktirmeye çalışın; Daha fazla kazanmaya başladıktan sonra tasarruf etmek imkansızdır.
tr_quotes.author: Jack Benny

tr_quotes.quote: Paranızı almadan önce asla harcamayın.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

tr_quotes.quote: Bireysel yatırımcı, spekülatör olarak değil, tutarlı bir yatırımcı olarak hareket etmelidir.
tr_quotes.author: Ben Graham

tr_quotes.quote: Finansal özgürlüğün büyük bir kısmı, kalbinizin ve zihninizin hayatın ne olması gerektiği konusunda endişelenmemesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Suze Orman

tr_quotes.quote: Tüm para bir inanç meselesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Adam Smith

tr_quotes.quote: Ön ödeme yapmam. Onun yerine yatırım yapardım ve yatırımların bunu karşılamasına izin verirdim.
tr_quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

tr_quotes.quote: Para iyi bir hizmetçidir ama kötü bir efendidir.
tr_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: Finans çok önemlidir. Altyapıya yeterli yatırım yapılırsa ve risk sermayesi sağlanırsa, durumda büyük bir iyileşme olacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Sanjay Kumar

tr_quotes.quote: Vergilerden kaçınma, hala herhangi bir ödül taşıyan tek entelektüel uğraştır.
tr_quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

tr_quotes.quote: Pek çok insan neredeyse sonuna gelene kadar parasıyla ilgilenmez ve diğerleri de zamanlarında aynısını yapar.
tr_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Kişisel finans, insanların kişisel sağlığı gibidir, acı çeken kişi için hayati ve trajik, ancak dinleyen için sıkıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Keneally

tr_quotes.quote: Size nasıl zengin olunacağını anlatacağım. Kapıları kapatın. Başkaları açgözlü olduğunda korkun. Başkaları korktuğunda açgözlü olun.
tr_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

tr_quotes.quote: Borsalar, aktif olandan sabırlı olana para aktarmak için tasarlanmıştır
tr_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

tr_quotes.quote: Her ödünç aldığınızda, gelecekteki halinizi çalıyorsunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Nathan W. Morris

tr_quotes.quote: Para başarıyı değil, başarma özgürlüğünü yaratır
tr_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

tr_quotes.quote: Sonunda insanı diğer hayvanlardan ayıran şeyin ne olduğunu anladım: finansal endişeler.
tr_quotes.author: Jules Renard

tr_quotes.quote: Para kazanmanın ilk kuralı, onu kaybetmemektir.
tr_quotes.author: Steven J. Lee

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar para kazandığınız değil, ne kadar para tuttuğunuz, sizin için ne kadar işe yaradığı ve bunu kaç nesil için sakladığınız.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

tr_quotes.quote: Geniş çeşitlilik yalnızca yatırımcılar ne yaptıklarını anlamadıklarında gereklidir.
tr_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

tr_quotes.quote: Paranın sadece para olduğunu ve karakter ya da şöhret olmadığını unutmayacaksınız.
tr_quotes.author: Steven J. Lee

tr_quotes.quote: Bir bütçe bize neyi karşılayamayacağımızı söyler, ancak bizi satın almaktan alıkoymaz.
tr_quotes.author: William Tüy

tr_quotes.quote: Para genellikle çok pahalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Yatırımda rahat olan nadiren kârlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Arnott

tr_quotes.quote: Yatırım yapmak bir tablonun boyasının kurumasını veya çimenlerin büyümesini izlemek gibidir.
tr_quotes.author: Paul Samuelson

tr_quotes.quote: Size nasıl zengin olacağınızı anlatayım. Tüm kapılarınızı kapatın. Herkes açgözlülük yaparken siz korkun, herkes korkarken de siz açgözlü olun.
tr_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

tr_quotes.quote: Zaman zaman borsa düşecek ve zarar edeceksiniz. Eğer bunun olacağını anlamıyorsanız borsaya girmeye hazır değilsinizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Peter Lynch

tr_quotes.quote: Bireysel bir yatırımcı bir spekülatör gibi değil bir yatırımcı gibi davranmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Ben Graham

tr_quotes.quote: Finansal huzur demek bir şeyler satın alabiliyor olmak demek değildir. Finansal huzur kazandığından daha azıyla yaşamayı öğrenip yatırım yapmaya para ayırabilmektir. Bunu başarabilene kadar hiçbir şey kazanamazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

tr_quotes.quote: Birçok insan parayla kavga halindedir, çünkü okulda sadece para kazanmak için çalışmayı öğrenirler. Paranın onlara hizmet etmesinin yollarını öğrendikleri nadirdir.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

tr_quotes.quote: Panik olmadan hisse senedi portföyünüzün %50 değer kaybetmesini izleyemeyecekseniz, hisse senedi piyasasında olmamalısınız.
tr_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinize yatırım yapın, zenginliğinizin kaynağı kariyerinizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Paul Clitheroe

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer zengin olmak istiyorsanız, kazanmak kadar biriktirmeyi de düşünün.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: Yatırım yaparken sabır dostunuz, ani kararlar ise düşmanınızdır.
tr_quotes.author: John Bogle

tr_quotes.quote: Derdiniz piyasanın ne yapacağı değil piyasanın yapacaklarına karşı sizin ne yapacağınız olsun.
tr_quotes.author: Michael Carr

tr_quotes.quote: Gelecek hiçbir zaman belirgin değildir ve piyasalarda keyif veren bir ortak görüş için çok yüksek bedel ödersiniz. Belirsizlik, uzun vadeli değerleri satın alan yatırımcının dostudur.
tr_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer yatırım eğlenceliyse, eğer eğleniyorsanız, muhtemelen para kazanamıyorsunuz demektir. İyi yatırım sıkıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: George Soros

en_quotes.quote: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: A budget tells us what we can't afford, but it doesn't keep us from buying it
en_quotes.author: William Feather

en_quotes.quote: Stay on top of your finances. Don't leave that up to others
en_quotes.author: Leif Garrett

en_quotes.quote: The only way you will ever permanently take control of your financial life is to dig deep and fix the root problem
en_quotes.author: Suze Orman

en_quotes.quote: Under capitalism, man exploits man. Under communism, it's just the opposite
en_quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

en_quotes.quote: Finance is a gun. Politics is knowing when to pull the trigger
en_quotes.author: Mario Puzo

en_quotes.quote: We cannot both preach and administer financial matters
en_quotes.author: Saint Stephen

en_quotes.quote: The avoidance of taxes is the only intellectual pursuit that still carries any reward
en_quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

en_quotes.quote: Our goal is to make finance the servant, not the master, of the real economy
en_quotes.author: Alistair Darling

en_quotes.quote: Any informed borrower is simply less vulnerable to fraud and abuse
en_quotes.author: Alan Greenspan

en_quotes.quote: Do you know the only thing that gives me pleasure? It's to see my dividends coming in
en_quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: We teach about how to drive in school, but not how to manage finances
en_quotes.author: Andy Williams

en_quotes.quote: Finance, like time, devours its own children
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: About the time we can make the ends meet, somebody moves the ends
en_quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

en_quotes.quote: If all the economists were laid end to end, they'd never reach a conclusion
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: As sure as the spring will follow the winter, prosperity and economic growth will follow recession
en_quotes.author: Bo Bennett

en_quotes.quote: Infinite growth of material consumption in a finite world is an impossibility
en_quotes.author: E. F. Schumacher

en_quotes.quote: I wasn't a financial pro, and I paid the price
en_quotes.author: Ruth Handler

en_quotes.quote: I went to the Wharton School of Finance, the toughest place to get into. I was a great student
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: The rate of interest acts as a link between income-value and capital-value
en_quotes.author: Irving Fisher

en_quotes.quote: I am a graduate in business management with specialisation in finance, and I love accounts!
en_quotes.author: Tena Desae

en_quotes.quote: Show people tend to treat their finances like their dentistry. They assume the man handling it knows what he is doing
en_quotes.author: Dick Cavett

en_quotes.quote: I only make movies to finance my fishing
en_quotes.author: Lee Marvin

en_quotes.quote: I made my money by selling too soon
en_quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

en_quotes.quote: The lesson of history is that you do not get a sustained economic recovery as long as the financial system is in crisis
en_quotes.author: Ben Bernanke

en_quotes.quote: Chidamabaram has ruined the economy. He has turned out to be a third-rate failure as finance minister
en_quotes.author: Subramanian Swamy

en_quotes.quote: I went to college at QUT: Queensland University of Technology. I studied for a Bachelors in finance and acting
en_quotes.author: Brenton Thwaites

en_quotes.quote: There can be no rise in the value of labour without a fall of profits
en_quotes.author: David Ricardo

en_quotes.quote: Capital is that part of wealth which is devoted to obtaining further wealth
en_quotes.author: Alfred Marshall

en_quotes.quote: Financial crises are like fireworks: they illuminate the sky even as they go pop
en_quotes.author: James Buchan

en_quotes.quote: I was a great student at a great school, Wharton School of Finance
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: Derivatives are financial weapons of mass destruction
en_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

en_quotes.quote: Security depends not so much upon how much you have, as upon how much you can do without
en_quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

en_quotes.quote: There's an awful lot of us who don't quite speak finance, speak money
en_quotes.author: John Lanchester

en_quotes.quote: The Finance Ministry can bring about real social change
en_quotes.author: Moshe Kahlon

en_quotes.quote: Watch your finances like a hawk
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: I've never preached one sermon on money, on just finances. I want to stay away from it
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: The poor don't know that their function in life is to exercise our generosity
en_quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

en_quotes.quote: The way to become rich is to put all your eggs in one basket and then watch that basket
en_quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Poverty is unnecessary
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Yunus

en_quotes.quote: I do not regard a broker as a member of the human race
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: Inflation is taxation without legislation
en_quotes.author: Milton Friedman

en_quotes.quote: I mean, I'm very serious with my kids about them comprehending the intricacies of global finance
en_quotes.author: Will Smith

en_quotes.quote: Tom DeLay may or may not have broken campaign finance laws, but he did his best to look like he was breaking them
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: There are no patents in finance
en_quotes.author: Stephen A. Schwarzman

en_quotes.quote: Money is the best rule of commerce
en_quotes.author: William Petty

en_quotes.quote: What we now call 'finance' is, I hold, an intellectual perversion of what began as warm human love
en_quotes.author: Robert Graves

en_quotes.quote: The single most important personal finance decision you make is your career
en_quotes.author: Sal Khan

en_quotes.quote: There's no question: the finance market is moving into the cloud
en_quotes.author: Aneel Bhusri

en_quotes.quote: I am favor of cutting taxes under any circumstances and for any excuse, for any reason, whenever it's possible
en_quotes.author: Milton Friedman

en_quotes.quote: The people who know personal finance hide the money very carefully
en_quotes.author: James Altucher

en_quotes.quote: The important source of finance is now commercial papers, bonds, and so on
en_quotes.author: Chanda Kochhar

en_quotes.quote: No single housing finance institution should be too big to fail
en_quotes.author: Jerome Powell

en_quotes.quote: Some of the people in finance touch enormous parts of the economy
en_quotes.author: Stephen A. Schwarzman

en_quotes.quote: It's cheaper to buy a house and finance it than it is to rent in many markets
en_quotes.author: Barry Sternlicht

en_quotes.quote: My adversary is the world of finance
en_quotes.author: Francois Hollande

en_quotes.quote: There's more honor in investment management than in investment banking
en_quotes.author: Charlie Munger

en_quotes.quote: I'm involved in the stock market, which is fun and, sometimes, very painful
en_quotes.author: Regis Philbin

en_quotes.quote: We need real campaign finance reform to loosen the grip of special interests on politics
en_quotes.author: Tom Daschle

en_quotes.quote: How grateful I am for the law of tithing. It is the Lord's law of finance
en_quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

en_quotes.quote: We have to talk about the way we finance campaigns
en_quotes.author: Dick Durbin

en_quotes.quote: Finance is wholly different from the rest the economy
en_quotes.author: Alan Greenspan

en_quotes.quote: The people who don't know personal finance have TV shows about it
en_quotes.author: James Altucher

en_quotes.quote: My father, being a Scotsman, taught me to look after finances. I'm shrewd. Some people may call me tight
en_quotes.author: Rod Stewart

en_quotes.quote: My most difficult class at Harvard Business School would have to be finance
en_quotes.author: Tyra Banks

en_quotes.quote: I finally know what distinguishes man from the other beasts: financial worries
en_quotes.author: Jules Renard

en_quotes.quote: There are some outcomes in finance we don't want, and government should regulate that
en_quotes.author: Andrew Ng

en_quotes.quote: I am particularly pleased to see that the Bendheim Center for Finance is thriving
en_quotes.author: Ben Bernanke

en_quotes.quote: Economically considered, war and revolution are always bad business
en_quotes.author: Ludwig von Mises

en_quotes.quote: If you're a teenager in Palo Alto launching an app, you know from the outset how you plan to finance your business
en_quotes.author: Natalie Massenet

en_quotes.quote: Artists should be able to thrive and allow their ideas to flourish as much as those in biotechnology or finance
en_quotes.author: Kehinde Wiley

en_quotes.quote: These heroes of finance are like beads on a string; when one slips off, all the rest follow
en_quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

en_quotes.quote: I grew up in Finance
en_quotes.author: Jamie S. Miller

en_quotes.quote: My mother works in a bank, and my dad is the head of my management team and also works in finance
en_quotes.author: Henry Cavill

en_quotes.quote: Particularly with internships, you have to work for a year with no money. How on Earth are you going to finance that?
en_quotes.author: Rob James-Collier

en_quotes.quote: If it isn't the sheriff, it's the finance company; I've got more attachments on me than a vacuum cleaner
en_quotes.author: John Barrymore

en_quotes.quote: Thirty to 40 years ago, most financial decisions were fairly simple
en_quotes.author: Scott Cook

en_quotes.quote: If I had sat around and waited until I had an idea to be a successful photographer, I would still be in finance
en_quotes.author: Brandon Stanton

en_quotes.quote: I have gone from a proponent of campaign finance reform to a revolutionary during my time in public service
en_quotes.author: Chris Murphy

en_quotes.quote: Almost every day, you see an article in the papers about someone violating a campaign finance law
en_quotes.author: Luther Strange

en_quotes.quote: Everyone says you've got to do a foundation and legal structure to finance social change. What nonsense!
en_quotes.author: Bill Drayton

en_quotes.quote: Wall Street has too much wealth and political power
en_quotes.author: Charlie Munger

en_quotes.quote: The studios don't finance anymore, they get outside funds
en_quotes.author: Robert Rodriguez

en_quotes.quote: We all know that Americans love their statistics - in sport, obviously. And in finance too
en_quotes.author: Evan Davis

en_quotes.quote: When I was the finance minister, I got on well with the RBI Governor
en_quotes.author: Manmohan Singh

en_quotes.quote: Well, paycheck protection is an important ingredient for a successful campaign finance reform measure
en_quotes.author: Andrew Card

en_quotes.quote: The biggest issue that we have to contend with is campaign finance reform
en_quotes.author: Gaby Hoffmann

en_quotes.quote: In Britain, polls show large majorities in favour of mansion taxes and higher taxes on the finance sector
en_quotes.author: Geoff Mulgan

en_quotes.quote: People who think about art as an investment are pathetic
en_quotes.author: Walter Annenberg

en_quotes.quote: I don't really enjoy finance and accounting
en_quotes.author: Holly Branson

en_quotes.quote: Financial support is one thing, but I always think what becomes really sacrificial is your time
en_quotes.author: Cliff Richard

en_quotes.quote: It's great to make strong, powerful films, but in terms of people wanting to finance them, it's also very difficult
en_quotes.author: John Hillcoat

en_quotes.quote: The economy is a very sensitive organism
en_quotes.author: Hjalmar Schacht

en_quotes.quote: At this point, I don't get hired a lot because people don't think I could finance a movie
en_quotes.author: Martha Plimpton

en_quotes.quote: New York City is the most important location in the world... it is the center for fashion, culture and finance
en_quotes.author: Jared Kushner

en_quotes.quote: Health care probably contributes a lot more to the common wealth than finance
en_quotes.author: Timothy Noah

en_quotes.quote: My dream is universal income, with a completely different fiscal system to finance it
en_quotes.author: Beppe Grillo

en_quotes.quote: One of the biggest issues for me is campaign finance reform
en_quotes.author: Cameron Russell

en_quotes.quote: As technology progresses, I believe that fintech will fundamentally change finance
en_quotes.author: Taavet Hinrikus

en_quotes.quote: The ministries of finance and industries and commerce require modern-minded, transparent, and efficient leadership
en_quotes.author: Sanjaya Baru

en_quotes.quote: After 2008, my brand of finance got a bad rap
en_quotes.author: Eugene Fama

en_quotes.quote: George Soros is one of the few characters from the world of finance who deserves to be called larger-than-life
en_quotes.author: Gary Weiss

en_quotes.quote: I studied finance and was a topper
en_quotes.author: Parineeti Chopra

en_quotes.quote: After my father died, we were pretty much wiped out financially as a family, so I decided to give finance a try
en_quotes.author: Leon Black

en_quotes.quote: I wouldn't finance a fad if I were a banker
en_quotes.author: Ken Hakuta

en_quotes.quote: World's major powers, including China and Russia, don't want to 'finance' American military adventures anymore
en_quotes.author: Max Keiser

en_quotes.quote: To beat the market you'll have to invest serious bucks to dig up information no one else has yet
en_quotes.author: Merton Miller

en_quotes.quote: You only need to make one big score in finance to be a hero forever
en_quotes.author: Merton Miller

en_quotes.quote: My expertise was in public finance, particularly corporate taxation, since I had worked at the US Treasury
en_quotes.author: Merton Miller

en_quotes.quote: Arbitrage proof has since been widely used throughout finance and economics
en_quotes.author: Merton Miller

en_quotes.quote: But having said that, what's happening with campaign finance reform and our political culture is devastating
en_quotes.author: Robert McChesney

en_quotes.quote: Back when 'social' had a broad definition, you could almost say that Yahoo Finance chat was the first social product
en_quotes.author: Carol Bartz

en_quotes.quote: I got IRS records to finance what I wanted to do
en_quotes.author: Penelope Spheeris

en_quotes.quote: As a novelist, I tell stories and people give me money. Then financial planners tell me stories and I give them money
en_quotes.author: Martin Cruz Smith

en_quotes.quote: I now work for a finance company in Luxembourg with projects in South America and the Caribbean
en_quotes.author: Mathias Rust

en_quotes.quote: Large companies cannot finance political parties as their shareholders and employees have different political views
en_quotes.author: Mikhail Khodorkovsky

en_quotes.quote: I really love being finance director
en_quotes.author: Judith McKenna

en_quotes.quote: Spain is finding it very difficult to finance itself with sovereign debt risk premium so high
en_quotes.author: Mariano Rajoy

en_quotes.quote: After serving in the Korean War, I actually started working towards a master's degree in finance
en_quotes.author: John Cullum

en_quotes.quote: Nobody wants campaign finance reform more than me. It would save me a fortune
en_quotes.author: Andrew Tobias

en_quotes.quote: I understand that finance can be very complex
en_quotes.author: Kevin Harrington

en_quotes.quote: The job of the Central Bank is to worry
en_quotes.author: Alice Rivlin

en_quotes.quote: Under capitalism each individual engages in economic planning
en_quotes.author: George Reisman

en_quotes.quote: It starts with campaign finance reform
en_quotes.author: Zack Space

en_quotes.quote: Rounding to the nearest cent is sufficiently accurate for practical purposes
en_quotes.author: Alexander John Ellis

en_quotes.quote: It's much more straightforward to get finance when you have an Oscar
en_quotes.author: Hugh Hudson
